name: Who's a Good Girl?
description:
Who's a Good Girl?" is game about herding stuff. 

 It's written in javascript using html5 and Canvas Query as framework.

Music comes from ozzed.net

This was my first attempt on a javascript game which took about two months to finish.
  

Instructions:

  • Move the mouse to control the dog, the dog will chase after the cursor.
  • Get the dog close to the animals (or mailmen/babies) to push them forward, try to keep the pack together!
  • Hold left mouse button to bark, it will add some extra push to the herd.
  • Don't get to close for too long time, or the animals will panic (turning red). Panicking animals are harder to control.
  • Complete a level by lead the required number of animals to the safety of the barn
